title: Eng nge sual tifai thei ang?
lyrics:
Eng nge sual tifai thei ang?
Isua Krista thisen chauhvin;
Eng nge min tidam leh ang?
Isua Krista thisen chauhvin.

Aw, Isua thisenin,
Fai takin min tleng a,
Faina dang a awm lo,
Isua Krista thisen lo chu.

Sual faina dang a awm lo,
Isua Krista thisen lo chu;
Thil tha rin ka chhawr lo ve,
Isua Krista thisen lo chu.

Eng mah dang ka duh lo ve,
Isua Krista thisen lo chu;
Chu chu ka lawmna a ni,
Isua Krista thisen chauh chu.
